name: Analyze, Fix & Sync
description: Continuous improvement: analyze needs → fix/refactor → GitHub sync

steps.name: 1. Analyze Needs
steps.prompt:
Analyze the project at {project_path}. 1. Run 'flutter analyze' and identify core issues.
2. Check 'git status' for uncommitted changes.
3. Identify what needs to be fixed, refactored, or organized.

steps.name: 2. Organize & Refactor
steps.prompt: Based on the analysis, organize the file structure and fix issues. Move related widgets into subfolders, ensure coding standards are met, and fix any syntax or linting errors found.

steps.name: 3. Sync to GitHub
steps.prompt:
Commit all changes to the local repository with a clear message summarizing the fixes and organization done. Push the changes to the remote branch on GitHub.Analyze the project at ../. 1. Run 'flutter analyze' and identify core issues.
2. Check 'git status' for uncommitted changes.
3. Identify what needs to be fixed, refactored, or organized.

steps.name: Step 4
steps.prompt: Think what things new to be better. Do and fix (Don't RUN KEYWORD: RedGifs) and enhance the UI.

steps.name: Step 5
steps.prompt: Think more of of Desktop App. Update README GIT.
